span.span: Represents one table of in-memory data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ADO.NET 库中的中央对象。The is a central object in the ADO.NET library. 其他对象使用包括和。Other objects that use the include the and the . 在访问时对象，请注意，它们是有条件地区分大小写。When accessing objects, note that they are conditionally case sensitive. 例如，如果一个名为"mydatatable"和另一个名为"Mydatatable"，用于搜索表中的一个的字符串将被视为区分大小写。For example, if one is named "mydatatable" and another is named "Mydatatable", a string used to search for one of the tables is regarded as case sensitive. 但是，如果"mydatatable"存在，并且"Mydatatable"不，搜索字符串将被视为区分。However, if "mydatatable" exists and "Mydatatable" does not, the search string is regarded as case insensitive. A可以包含两个具有相同的对象属性值但是具有不同属性值。A can contain two objects that have the same property value but different property values. 有关使用对象，请参阅[创建数据表](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md)。For more information about working with objects, see [Creating a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md). 如果要创建以编程方式，你首先必须通过添加定义其架构对象添加到(通过访问属性)。If you are creating a programmatically, you must first define its schema by adding objects to the (accessed through the property). 有关添加详细信息对象，请参阅[向数据表添加列](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information about adding objects, see [Adding Columns to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable.md). 若要将行添加到，必须首先使用方法以返回一个新对象。To add rows to a , you must first use the method to return a new object. 方法返回的架构行，因为它由表的定义。The method returns a row with the schema of the , as it is defined by the table's . 行的最大数目可以存储是 16777216。The maximum number of rows that a can store is 16,777,216. 有关详细信息，请参阅[向数据表添加数据](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information, see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md). 还包含一套可以用于确保数据完整性的对象。The also contains a collection of objects that can be used to ensure the integrity of the data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据表约束](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md)。For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints.md). 有许多可以用于确定当对表进行更改的事件。There are many events that can be used to determine when changes are made to a table. 其中包括 、、 和 。These include , , , and . 有关可与事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理数据表事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events.md)。For more information about the events that can be used with a , see [Handling DataTable Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events.md). 实例时创建后，某些的读/写属性设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数主题。For a list of these values, see the constructor topic. > [!NOTE] > 和对象继承自，并且支持.NET Framework 远程处理的接口。The and objects inherit from , and support the interface for .NET Framework remoting. 这些是唯一可用于.NET Framework 远程处理的 ADO.NET 对象。These are the only ADO.NET objects that you can use for .NET Framework remoting. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个对象和一个对象，并将添加到的新对象。The following example creates two objects and one object, and adds the new objects to a . 表将显示在控件。The tables are then displayed in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks A定义两个表之间的关系。A defines the relationship between two tables. 通常情况下，通过单个字段包含相同的数据链接两个表。Typically, two tables are linked through a single field that contains the same data. 例如，其中包含地址数据的表可能具有单个字段，其中包含表示国家/地区代码。For example, a table which contains address data may have a single field containing codes that represent countries/regions. 包含国家/地区的数据的第二个表将具有单个字段包含标识国家/地区代码和它将此代码会插入到第一个表中的对应字段。A second table that contains country/region data will have a single field that contains the code that identifies the country/region, and it is this code which is inserted into the corresponding field in the first table. A ，然后，包含至少四部分信息: (1) 的第一个表名称、 中的第一个表 （2） 的列名称、 第二个表，（3） 的名称和第二个表中 （4） 的列名称。A , then, contains at least four pieces of information: (1) the name of the first table, (2) the column name in the first table, (3) the name of the second table, and (4) the column name in the second table. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性以返回每个子中。The following example uses the property to return each child in a . 每个关系中的参数作为用方法返回行的数组。Each relation is then used as an argument in the method of the to return an array of rows. 然后打印的行中的每个列的值。The value of each column in the row is then printed. remarks.format: ## Remarks `expression`参数需要聚合函数。The `expression` parameter requires an aggregate function. 例如，下面是一个合法的表达式：For example, the following is a legal expression: `Count(Quantity)` 但是，此表达式不是：But this expression is not: `Sum (Quantity * UnitPrice)` 如果必须执行两个或多个列上的操作，则应创建，将其到适当的表达式，并使用在生成的列的聚合表达式中的属性。If you must perform an operation on two or more columns, you should create a , set its property to an appropriate expression, and use an aggregate expression on the resulting column. 在这种情况下，给定具有名称"总"，与属性设置为此：In that case, given a with the name "total", and the property set to this: `"Quantity * UnitPrice"` 表达式参数方法将为此：The expression argument for the method would then be this: `Sum(total)` 第二个参数， `filter`，确定在表达式中使用哪些行。The second parameter, `filter`, determines which rows are used in the expression. 例如，如果表包含一个名为"colDate"的日期列，则无法限制使用以下表达式的行：For example, if the table contains a date column named "colDate", you could limit the rows with the following expression: `colDate > 1/1/99 AND colDate < 17/1/99` 有关创建这两个参数的表达式的规则，请参阅属性。For rules on creating expressions for both parameters, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例针对名"总计"，为其标识号为五位销售人员的列的值求和。The following example sums the values of a column named "Total", for the salesperson whose identification number is five. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTable.Compute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable.Compute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTable.Compute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable.Compute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Load`方法可在几种常见情况，都围绕着从指定的数据源获取数据并将其添加到当前的数据容器 (在这种情况下， `DataTable`)。The `Load` method can be used in several common scenarios, all centered around getting data from a specified data source and adding it to the current data container (in this case, a `DataTable`). 以下方案说明的标准用法`DataTable`、 描述其更新和合并行为。These scenarios describe standard usage for a `DataTable`, describing its update and merge behavior. A`DataTable`同步或更新与单个主数据源。A `DataTable` synchronizes or updates with a single primary data source. `DataTable`跟踪更改，以实现与主数据源同步。The `DataTable` tracks changes, allowing synchronization with the primary data source. 此外，`DataTable`可以接受来自一个或多个辅助数据源的增量数据。In addition, a `DataTable` can accept incremental data from one or more secondary data sources. `DataTable`不负责跟踪更改，以便允许与辅助数据源同步。The `DataTable` isn't responsible for tracking changes in order to allow synchronization with the secondary data source. 提供这些两个假设数据源，用户很可能需要的以下行为之一：Given these two hypothetical data sources, a user is likely to require one of the following behaviors: - 初始化`DataTable`从主数据源。Initialize `DataTable` from a primary data source. 在此方案中，用户想要初始化一个空`DataTable`与主数据源中的值。In this scenario, the user wants to initialize an empty `DataTable` with values from the primary data source. 更高版本，用户想要将更改传播回主数据源。Later the user intends to propagate changes back to the primary data source. - 保留更改，并从主数据源重新同步。Preserve changes and re-synchronize from the primary data source. 在此方案中，用户想要采用`DataTable`填充在前面的方案和执行增量同步使用主数据源，保留中所做修改`DataTable`。In this scenario, the user wants to take the `DataTable` filled in the previous scenario and perform an incremental synchronization with the primary data source, preserving modifications made in the `DataTable`. - 增量数据馈送从辅助数据源。Incremental data feed from secondary data sources. 在此方案中，用户想从一个或多个辅助数据源的更改，并将合并这些将更改传播回主数据源。In this scenario, the user wants to merge changes from one or more secondary data sources, and propagate those changes back to the primary data source. `Load`方法使所有这些方案成为可能。The `Load` method makes all these scenarios possible. 所有但一个作为参数的重载此方法允许您指定的负载选项参数，指示如何中的现有行结合正在加载的行。All but one of the overloads for this method allows you to specify a load option parameter, indicating how rows already in a combine with rows being loaded. （不允许你指定的行为的重载使用默认加载选项。）下表描述了由提供的三个负载选项枚举。(The overload that doesn't allow you to specify the behavior uses the default load option.) The following table describes the three load options provided by the enumeration. 每种情况下，说明该值传入数据中的行的主键值匹配的现有行的主键时，指示的行为。In each case, the description indicates the behavior when the primary key of a row in the incoming data matches the primary key of an existing row. |加载选项Load Option|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`PreserveChanges`（默认值）`PreserveChanges` (default)|使用传入的行的值更新行的原始版本。Updates the original version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`OverwriteChanges`|使用传入的行的值更新行的当前和原始版本。Updates the current and original versions of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`Upsert`|使用传入的行的值更新行的当前版本。Updates the current version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| 一般情况下，`PreserveChanges`和`OverwriteChanges`选项适用于用户需要将同步的情形`DataSet`及其更改与主数据源。In general, the `PreserveChanges` and `OverwriteChanges` options are intended for scenarios in which the user needs to synchronize the `DataSet` and its changes with the primary data source. `Upsert`选项可帮助聚合来自一个或多个辅助数据源的更改。The `Upsert` option facilitates aggregating changes from one or more secondary data sources. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一些调用所涉及的问题方法。The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the method. 首先，该示例侧重于架构问题，包括从加载推断架构，然后处理不兼容的架构和架构具有列缺失或其他列。First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded , and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns. 然后，该示例着重于数据问题，包括处理各种的加载选项。The example then focuses on data issues, including handling the various loading options. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用的重载版本之一`Load`。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of `Load`. 有关可能会提供其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad/VB/source.vb#1)]

## Remarks 方法使用的第一个结果集加载，并成功完成后，将读取器的位置设置为下一个结果集，如果有的话。The method consumes the first result set from the loaded , and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any. 转换数据时，`Load`方法使用相同的转换规则方法。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. 方法必须考虑三个特定问题时加载的数据从实例： 架构、 数据和事件的操作。The method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 使用架构时,方法可能会遇到条件下表中所述。When working with the schema, the method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 架构操作发生的所有导入的结果集，甚至那些不包含任何数据。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |条件Condition|行为Behavior| |---------------|--------------| |没有架构。The has no schema.|方法推理基于来自导入的结果集架构。The method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| |拥有的架构，但它与加载的架构不兼容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|方法引发异常对应于试图将数据加载到不兼容的架构时发生的特定错误。The method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.| |架构是兼容，但加载的结果集架构包含中不存在的列。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that do not exist in the .|方法将添加的额外列`DataTable`的架构。The method adds the extra columns to `DataTable`'s schema. 该方法将引发异常，如果对应中的列和加载的结果集不兼容的值。The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the and the loaded result set are not value compatible. 该方法还会从结果集中为所有添加的列检索约束信息。The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns. 仅当除外 Primary Key 约束的情况下，使用此约束信息当前不包含在启动时加载操作的任何列。Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.| |架构是兼容，但加载的结果集架构包含较少的列比`DataTable`。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.|如果缺少列已定义的默认值或列的数据类型可以为 null，方法允许要添加的行替换为默认值或`null`缺少的列的值。If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or `null` value for the missing column. 如果没有默认值或`null`可以使用，则`Load`方法引发异常。If no default value or `null` can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception. 如果已不提供任何特定的默认值，`Load`方法使用`null`默示的默认值的值。If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the `null` value as the implied default value.| 在考虑的行为之前`Load`方法根据数据操作，请考虑，每个行内维护的当前值和每个列的原始值。Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a maintains both the current value and the original value for each column. 这些值可能相同，或如果后填充发生了更改的行中的数据可能不同`DataTable`。These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行状态和行版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)。For more information, see [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md). 此版本的`Load`方法会尝试保留的每一行，保持不变的原始值中的当前值。This version of the `Load` method attempts to preserve the current values in each row, leaving the original value intact. (如果你想更好地控制传入数据的行为，请参阅。)如果现有行和传入行将包含相应的主键值，则使用其当前的行状态值处理行，否则它将被视为新行。(If you want finer control over the behavior of incoming data, see .) If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row. 在事件操作方面事件发生之前更改每个行，与事件发生在每个行已更改之后。In terms of event operations, the event occurs before each row is changed, and the event occurs after each row has been changed. 在每个情况下，属性传递给事件处理程序的实例包含有关与事件关联的特定操作的信息。In each case, the property of the instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event. 此操作的值取决于行之前加载操作的状态。This action value depends on the state of the row before the load operation. 在每个情况下，这两个事件发生，且操作为每个相同。In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each. 操作可以应用于当前或原始版本的每一行，或两者，具体取决于当前的行状态。The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state. 下表显示了行为`Load`方法。The following table displays behavior for the `Load` method. 最终 （标记为"（不提供）"） 的行所说明的行为传入不匹配任何现有行的行。The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row. 此表中的每个单元格连同描述行中的字段的当前和原始值后的值为`Load`方法已完成。Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the for the value after the `Load` method has completed. 在这种情况下，该方法不允许你以指示加载选项，并使用默认值， `PreserveChanges`。In this case, the method doesn't allow you to indicate the load option, and uses the default, `PreserveChanges`. |现有 DataRowStateExisting DataRowState|之后的值`Load`方法和事件操作Values after `Load` method, and event action| |---------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| |已添加Added|当前 =\<现有 >Current = \

原始 =\<传入 >Original = \

状态 =\<修改 >State = \

行操作 = 更改原始值RowAction = ChangeOriginal| |修改时间Modified|当前 =\<现有 >Current = \

原始 =\<传入 >Original = \

状态 =\<修改 >State = \

行操作 = 更改原始值RowAction = ChangeOriginal| |DeletedDeleted|当前 =\<不可用 >Current = \

原始 =\<传入 >Original = \

状态 =\<删除 >State = \

行操作 = 更改原始值RowAction = ChangeOriginal| |UnchangedUnchanged|当前 =\<传入 >Current = \

原始 =\<传入 >Original = \

状态 =\<不变 >State = \

行操作 = ChangeCurrentAndOriginalRowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginal| |（不提供）(Not present)|当前 =\<传入 >Current = \

原始 =\<传入 >Original = \

状态 =\<不变 >State = \

行操作 = ChangeCurrentAndOriginalRowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginal| 中的值可以如约束通过使用属性和。Values in a can be constrained through use of properties such as and . `Load`方法可处理此类列与列的属性定义的行为一致的方式。The `Load` method handles such columns in a manner that is consistent with the behavior defined by the column's properties. 上的只读的约束仅适用于在内存中发生更改。The read only constraint on a is applicable only for changes that occur in memory. `Load`方法的覆盖的只读的列的值，如果需要。The `Load` method's overwrites the read-only column values, if needed. 若要确定哪个版本的用于比较的传入行具有的当前行的主键字段`Load`方法使用行中的主键值的原始版本，如果它存在。To determine which version of the primary key field to use for comparing the current row with an incoming row, the `Load` method uses the original version of the primary key value within a row, if it exists. 否则为`Load`方法使用当前版本的主键字段。Otherwise, the `Load` method uses the current version of the primary key field. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一些调用所涉及的问题方法。The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the method. 首先，该示例侧重于架构问题，包括从加载推断架构，然后处理不兼容的架构和架构具有列缺失或其他列。First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded , and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns. 该示例然后调用`Load`方法，显示的数据之前和之后加载操作。The example then calls the `Load` method, displaying the data both before and after the load operation. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableLoad.IDataReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad.IDataReader/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableLoad.IDataReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad.IDataReader/VB/source.vb#1)]

result set, if any. 转换数据时，`Load`方法使用相同的转换规则方法。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. `Load`方法必须考虑三个特定问题时加载的数据从实例： 架构、 数据和事件的操作。The `Load` method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 使用架构时,`Load`方法可能会遇到条件下表中所述。When working with the schema, the `Load` method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 架构操作发生的所有导入的结果集，甚至那些不包含任何数据。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |条件Condition|行为Behavior| |---------------|--------------| |没有架构。The has no schema.|`Load`方法推理基于来自导入的结果集架构。The `Load` method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| |拥有的架构，但它与加载的架构不兼容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|`Load`方法引发异常对应于试图将数据加载到不兼容的架构时发生的特定错误。The `Load` method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error exist in the `DataTable`.|`Load`方法将添加的额外列`DataTable`的架构。The `Load` method adds the extra columns to `DataTable`’s schema. 该方法将引发异常，如果对应中的列和加载的结果集不兼容的值。The method throws an exception if corresponding parameter influences the processing of the incoming data. remarks.format:
## Remarks `Load`方法使用的第一个结果集加载，并成功完成后，将读取器的位置设置为下一个结果集，如果有的话。The `Load` method consumes the first result set from the loaded , and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any. 转换数据时，`Load`方法使用相同的转换规则方法。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. `Load`方法必须考虑三个特定问题时加载的数据从实例： 架构、 数据和事件的操作。The `Load` method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 使用架构时,`Load`方法可能会遇到条件下表中所述。When working with the schema, the `Load` method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 架构操作发生的所有导入的结果集，甚至那些不包含任何数据。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |条件Condition|行为Behavior| |---------------|--------------| |没有架构。The has no schema.|`Load`方法推理基于来自导入的结果集架构。The `Load` method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| |拥有的架构，但它与加载的架构不兼容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|`Load`方法引发异常对应于试图将数据加载到不兼容的架构时发生的特定错误。The `Load` method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.| |架构是兼容，但加载的结果集架构包含在中不存在的列`DataTable`。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that don't exist in the `DataTable`.|`Load`方法将添加到的额外列`DataTable`的架构。The `Load` method adds the extra column(s) to `DataTable`’s schema. 该方法将引发异常，如果对应中的列和加载的结果集不兼容的值。The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the and the loaded result set are not value compatible. 该方法还会从结果集中为所有添加的列检索约束信息。The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns. 仅当除外 Primary Key 约束的情况下，使用此约束信息当前不包含在启动时加载操作的任何列。Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.| |架构是兼容，但加载的结果集架构包含较少的列比`DataTable`。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.|如果缺少列已定义的默认值或列的数据类型可以为 null，`Load`方法允许要添加的行替换缺少的列的默认值或 null 值。If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the `Load` method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or null value for the missing column. 如果可以使用任何默认值或 null，则`Load`方法引发异常。If no default value or null can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception. 如果已不提供任何特定的默认值，`Load`方法使用隐含的默认值为 null 的值。If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the null value as the implied default value.| 在考虑的行为之前`Load`方法根据数据操作，请考虑，每个行内维护的当前值和每个列的原始值。Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a maintains both the current value and the original value for each column. 这些值可能相同，或如果后填充发生了更改的行中的数据可能不同`DataTable`。These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`. 请参阅[行状态和行版本](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md)有关详细信息。See [Row States and Row Versions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions.md) for more information. 在此方法调用中，指定参数影响的传入数据的处理。In this method call, the specified parameter influences the processing of the incoming data. Load 方法应如何处理具有相同的主键作为现有行的加载行？How should the Load method handle loading rows that have the same primary key as existing rows? 它应修改当前值和 / 或原始值？Should it modify current values, original values, or both? 这些问题，和的详细信息，由控制`loadOption`参数。These issues, and more, are controlled by the `loadOption` parameter. 如果现有行和传入行将包含相应的主键值，则使用其当前的行状态值处理行，否则它将被视为新行。If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row. 在事件操作方面事件发生之前更改每个行，与事件发生在每个行已更改之后。In terms of event operations, the event occurs before each row is changed, and the event occurs after each row has been changed. 在每个情况下，属性传递给事件处理程序的实例包含有关与事件关联的特定操作的信息。In each case, the property of the instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event. 此操作值都不同，具体取决于行之前加载操作的状态。This action value varies, depending on the state of the row before the load operation. 在每个情况下，这两个事件发生，且操作为每个相同。In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each. 操作可以应用于当前或原始版本的每一行，或两者，具体取决于当前的行状态。The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state. 下表显示负载方法调用每个时的行为`LoadOption`值，并显示如何与正在加载的行的行状态进行交互的值。The following table displays behavior for the Load method when called with each of the `LoadOption` values, and also shows how the values interact with the row state for the row being loaded. 最终 （标记为"（不提供）"） 的行所说明的行为传入不匹配任何现有行的行。The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row. 此表中的每个单元格连同描述行中的字段的当前和原始值后的值为`Load`方法已完成。Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the for the value after the `Load` method has completed. |现有 DataRowStateExisting DataRowState|UpsertUpsert|OverwriteChangesOverwriteChanges|PreserveChanges （默认行为）PreserveChanges (Default behavior)| |---------------------------|------------|----------------------|------------------------------------------| |已添加Added|当前 =\<传入 >Current = \

`errorHandler`参数是指将数据加载过程中发生错误时调用的过程的委托。The `errorHandler` parameter is a delegate that refers to a procedure that is called when an error occurs while loading data. 传递给过程的参数提供的属性，使您得以检索有关错误的发生，而当前行的数据，信息和填充的。The parameter passed to the procedure provides properties that allow you to retrieve information about the error that occurred, the current row of data, and the being filled. 使用此委托机制，而不是更简单的 try/catch 块，可以确定该错误，处理这种情况，并继续如果愿意处理。Using this delegate mechanism, rather than a simpler try/catch block, allows you to determine the error, handle the situation, and continue processing if you like. 参数提供属性： 将此属性设置为`true`以指示你已处理错误，并且希望继续进行处理。The parameter supplies a property: set this property to `true` to indicate that you have handled the error and wish to remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接受的值的数组，并在主键列中查找匹配的值。The method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s). 如果列具有默认值，请设置该列的默认值数组中传递 null 值。If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column. 同样，如果某一列具有其属性设置为 true，则要设置行自动生成的值的数组中传递 null 值。Similarly, if a column has its property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row. 如果`fAcceptChanges`参数是`true`或未指定，将添加新数据，然后调用以接受中的所有更改; 如果参数是`false`，新添加的行标记为插入、 和到的更改现有行被标记为修改。If the `fAcceptChanges` parameter is `true` or not specified, the new data is added and then is called to accept all changes in the ; if the argument is `false`, newly added rows are marked as insertions, and changes to existing rows are marked as modifications. 也可在发生异常或事件。Exceptions can also occur during either a or event. 如果发生异常，则行未添加到表中。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. 使用结合和。Use in conjunction with and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来尝试查找行。The following example uses the method to attempt to find a row. 如果未不找到任何此类行，这些值用于创建新行。If no such row is found, the values are used to create a new row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接受的值的数组，并在主键列中查找匹配的值。The method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s). 如果列具有默认值，请设置该列的默认值数组中传递 null 值。If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column. 同样，如果某一列具有其属性设置为 true，则要设置行自动生成的值的数组中传递 null 值。Similarly, if a column has its property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row. 值`loadOption`参数用于确定如何将数组中的值应用于现有行。The value of the `loadOption` parameter is used to determine how the values in the array are applied to an existing row. 例如，如果`loadOption`设置为`OverwriteChanges`、`Original`和`Current`的每个列的值将替换中的传入行的值与`RowState`属性设置为`Unchanged`。For example, if `loadOption` is set to `OverwriteChanges`, the `Original` and `Current` values of each column are replaced with the values in the incoming row and the `RowState` property is set to `Unchanged`. 也可在发生异常或事件。Exceptions can also occur during either a or event. 如果发生异常，则行未添加到表中。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. 使用结合和。Use in conjunction with and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Merge`方法用于合并两个有很大程度上类似的架构的对象。The `Merge` method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合并通常用于对客户端应用程序，以将数据源的最新的更改合并到现有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 这允许客户端应用程序具有刷新使用数据源的最新的数据。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 仅对原始表和表要合并，则合并操作将考虑在内。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 不受影响或包含子表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果表具有一个或多个定义的一种关系，一部分的子表必须单独合并每个子表。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示的行为`missingSchemaAction`参数方法。The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the method. 此示例创建两个版本的同一个表，修改的第二个版本的架构。This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version. 然后，代码尝试将第二个表合并到第一个。The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用合并的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of Merge. 有关可能会提供其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Merge 方法用于合并两个有很大程度上类似的架构的对象。The Merge method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合并通常用于对客户端应用程序，以将数据源的最新的更改合并到现有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 这允许客户端应用程序具有刷新使用数据源的最新的数据。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 仅对原始表和表要合并，则合并操作将考虑在内。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 不受影响或包含子表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果表具有一个或多个定义的一种关系，一部分的子表必须单独合并每个子表。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. `Merge`方法通常称为涉及验证更改、 协调错误、 与所做的更改，更新数据源和最后刷新现有的过程的一系列末尾。The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 当执行合并时，在合并前的现有数据所做的更改会在合并操作期间，保留默认情况下。When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved by default during the merge operation. 开发人员可以修改此行为通过其他两个重载之一调用此方法，并指定为返回值为 false`preserveChanges`参数。Developers can modify this behavior by calling one of the other two overloads for this method, and specifying a false value for the `preserveChanges` parameter. 在客户端应用程序，它是通常有一个按钮，用户可以单击它来收集已更改的数据并将其发送回中间层组件之前对它进行验证。In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component. 在此方案中，第一次调用方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 方法将返回第二个优化为验证和合并。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 第二个对象只包含已更改，从而导致原始的子集的对象。This second object contains only the objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 此子集通常较小，因此可以更有效地传递回中间层组件。This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component. 然后，中间层组件使用通过存储过程的更改更新原始数据源。The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 然后，中间层可以发送回一个新，包括原始数据和数据源的最新数据 （通过再次运行原始查询），或者它可以发送回包含从数据源对其进行任何更改的子集。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果数据源会自动创建唯一的主键值，这些值可以将传播回客户端应用程序。）在任一情况下，返回必须合并回客户端应用程序的原始与方法。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 合并新的源时到目标中时，任何源行与值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`，与具有相同的主键值的目标行匹配。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted`, is matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 源行值`Added`具有相同作为新的源行的主键值的新目标行匹配。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序创建一个简单然后将数据添加到表。The following console application creates a simple and adds data to the table. 然后，示例创建表，将行添加到复制的副本。The example then creates a copy of the table, adding rows to the copy. 最后，该示例调用方法合并第二个表中的第一个表中的数据的数据。Finally, the example calls the method to merge the data in the second table with the data in the first table. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.Merge#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.Merge/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.Merge#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.Merge/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.PrimaryKeyEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置用作数据表主键的列数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of columns that function as primary keys for the data table.

value.span: 一个 对象数组。

span.span: An array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表的主键必须唯一标识表中的记录。The primary key of a table must be unique to identify the record in the table. 还有可能获得具有主键的两个或多个列组成的表。It's also possible to have a table with a primary key made up of two or more columns. 在单个列不能包含足够的唯一值时，将发生这种情况。This occurs when a single column can't contain enough unique values. 例如，"FirstName"和"LastName"列可能包含两个列的主键。For example, a two column primary key might consist of a "FirstName" and "LastName" column. 因为主键可以由构成的多个列，属性包含的数组对象。Because primary keys can be made up of more than one column, the property consists of an array of objects. ## Examples 第一个示例演示如何返回有关的主键列中显示`DataGrid`。The first example shows how to return the primary key columns for a displayed in a `DataGrid`. 第二个示例演示如何设置有关的主键列。The second example demonstrates how to set the primary key columns for a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTable.PrimaryKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable.PrimaryKey Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTable.PrimaryKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable.PrimaryKey Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 XML 架构和数据读入 。

span.span: Reads XML schema and data into the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供方法读取只将数据或数据和架构读入从 XML 文档，而方法读取仅的架构。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 若要读取数据和架构，使用之一`ReadXML`重载，以包括`XmlReadMode`参数，并将其值设置为`ReadSchema`。To read both data and schema, use one of the `ReadXML` overloads that include the `XmlReadMode` parameter, and set its value to `ReadSchema`. 请注意，同样适用于和方法，分别。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 要写入的 XML 数据，或架构和数据从`DataTable`，使用`WriteXml`方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要编写只为架构，使用`WriteXmlSchema`方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的列类型，将引发`DataRow`正在读取或写入到实现，却未实现。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement .

span.span: An object that derives from

summary.span: 使用指定的 将 XML 架构和数据读入 。

span.span: Reads XML schema and data into the using the specified .

returns.span: 用于读取数据的 。

span.span: The used to read the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前及其子代加载从提供的数据。The current and its descendents are loaded with the data from the supplied . 此方法的行为等同于的仅为当前表及其子代加载方法，这在这种情况下，数据除外。The behavior of this method is identical to that of the method, except that in this case, data is loaded only for the current table and its descendants. 方法提供方法读取只将数据或数据和架构读入从 XML 文档，而方法读取仅的架构。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 请注意，同样适用于和方法，分别。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 要写入的 XML 数据，或架构和数据从`DataTable`，使用`WriteXml`方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要编写只为架构，使用`WriteXmlSchema`方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的列类型，将引发`DataRow`正在读取或写入到实现，却未实现。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定内联架构，内联架构用于扩展现有的关系结构之前加载数据。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果存在任何冲突 （例如，定义具有不同数据类型的同一个表中的相同列） 被引发异常。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果不指定任何内联架构，则关系结构通过推理，如有必要，扩展根据 XML 文档的结构。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果无法通过推断扩展架构，才能公开的所有数据，则引发异常。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > `DataSet`不将 XML 元素关联与其对应`DataColumn`或`DataTable`合法的 XML 字符，如 ("_") 在序列化的 XML 中的转义时。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet`本身仅为 XML 元素名称中的非法 XML 字符进行转义，因此只能使用相同。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 当 XML 元素名称中的合法字符进行转义时，处理时将忽略该元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含两个列和十个行。The following example creates a containing two columns and ten rows. 此示例将架构和数据迁移到内存流，通过调用方法。The example writes the schema and data to a memory stream, by invoking the method. 此示例将创建第二个和调用方法以用架构和数据填充它。The example creates a second and calls the method to fill it with schema and data. is ignored while processing. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含两个列和十个行。The following example creates a containing two columns and ten rows. 此示例将架构和数据写入。The example writes the schema and data to an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了编写只将数据方法或数据和架构从插入 XML 文档，而方法将写入仅的架构。The method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 若要编写数据和架构，使用包含的重载之一参数，并将其值设置为`WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that include the parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`. 请注意，同样适用于和方法，分别。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 读取 XML 数据或架构和数据读入`DataTable`，使用`ReadXml`方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要只读取架构，使用`ReadXmlSchema`方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的列类型，将引发`DataRow`正在读取或写入到实现，却未实现。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序创建两个实例，将每个，创建相关的两个表，，然后使用方法写入到父表中包含的数据.The following console application creates two instances, adds each to a , creates a relating the two tables, and then uses the method to write the data contained within the parent table to a . 设置时，此示例演示行为`writeHierarchy`到每个其值的参数。The example demonstrates the behavior when setting the `writeHierarchy` parameter to each of its values. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 WriteXml 的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of WriteXml. 有关可能会提供其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` ============================== Customer table, without hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ ============================== Customer table, with hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ 1 1 2003-12-02T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 2 1 2004-01-03T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 3 2 2004-11-13T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 4 3 2004-05-16T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 5 3 2004-05-22T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 6 4 2004-06-15T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了编写只将数据方法或数据和架构从插入 XML 文档，而方法将写入仅的架构。The method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 若要编写数据和架构，使用包含的重载之一参数，并将其值设置为`WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that includes the parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`. 请注意，同样适用于和方法，分别。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 读取 XML 数据或架构和数据读入`DataTable`，使用`ReadXml`方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要只读取架构，使用`ReadXmlSchema`方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. 通常`WriteXml`方法将写入当前表的数据。Normally the `WriteXml` method writes the data only for the current table. 要写入当前表和所有其后代的数据相关的表，请调用此方法的`writeHierarchy`参数设置为`true`。To write the data for the current table and all of its descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的列类型，将引发`DataRow`正在读取或写入到实现，却未实现。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法写入的架构到 XML 文档。Use the method to write the schema for a to an XML document. 架构包含表、 关系和约束定义。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 使用 XSD 标准编写 XML 架构。The XML schema is written using the XSD standard. 若要将数据写入到 XML 文档，使用方法。To write the data to an XML document, use the method. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序创建两个实例，将每个，创建相关的两个表，，然后使用方法写入到父表中包含的数据.The following console application creates two instances, adds each to a , creates a relating the two tables, and then uses the method to write the data contained within the parent table to a . 设置时，此示例演示行为`writeHierarchy`到每个其值的参数。The example demonstrates the behavior when setting the `writeHierarchy` parameter to each of its values. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用的重载版本之一`WriteXmlSchema`有关可能可用，其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of `WriteXmlSchema` For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlSchemaOverload/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` ============================== Customer table, without hierarchy ============================== ============================== Customer table, with hierarchy ============================== ```

param.span: 如果为 ，则写入当前表及其所有子代的架构。

span.span: If , write the schema of the current table and all its descendants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法写入的架构到 XML 文档。Use the method to write the schema for a to an XML document. 架构包含表、 关系和约束定义。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 使用 XSD 标准编写 XML 架构。The XML schema is written using the XSD standard. 若要将数据写入到 XML 文档，使用方法。To write the data to an XML document, use the method. 通常`WriteXmlSchema`方法将写入当前表的架构。Normally the `WriteXmlSchema` method writes the schema only for the current table. 若要写入当前表和及其所有子代和相关表的架构，调用与方法`writeHierarchy`参数设置为`true`。To write the schema for the current table and its entire descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`.
